assessmentItem.title: Evaluate f(2^k) for f=2^n, log2(n), etc., for small k

td.feedbackInline: Your answer is not in its simplest form.

feedbackBlock.p: You have had three attempts at answering this question, so here is the solution:
Substitute the value for n in the function and evaluate.
Since you have viewed the solution, your score for this question will be 0.
Since you have viewed the hint, your score for this question will be halved.
